alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 01 at 1:28PM MST until July 01 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE ANTELOPE CREEK BASIN REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 127 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms continuing to produce heavy rain over the Antelope Creek basin. Between 0.25 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Antelope Creek basin. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Antelope Creek basin. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Page, Antelope Canyon Near Sr 98, Antelope Creek Basin, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Lake Powell and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following slot canyons... Upper Antelope Canyon, Lower Antelope Canyon, Canyon X, Cardiac Canyon, Owl Canyon, Rattlesnake Canyon, Ramshead Canyon, Wind Pebble Canyon and Porcupine Canyon. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Antelope Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Get out of Antelope Canyon and other area slot canyons immediately! Deadly flash flooding is imminent or occurring!
